error.name: error
error.purpose: General error message to return when there is an issue with fulfilling the request.

help.name: help
responses: You can check system status, get metrics, or run a job.  Which would you like to do?

test_2_variables.name: test_2_variables
test_2_variables.purpose: To make sure two variables can be replaced.
responses: My name is %%my_name%% and your name is %%your_name%%.
Nice to meet you %%your_name%%. My name is %%my_name%%.

currentstatus.name: currentstatus
currentstatus.purpose: Report on all primary status reports.
responses: RAM usage is at %%1%% percent. Go routine count is at %%2%%, and %%3%% of %%4%% databases are up.
